VICE: Here’s what Planned Parenthood plans to do about Kavanaugh https://t.co/krvjYiXYZd #SaveRoe #CareForAll

No matter what Donald Trump, Mike Pence, or Brett Kavanaugh may say, each of us deserves the right to control our own bodies. That includes the right to decide if and when to become a parent. #SaveRoe #CareForAll
We believe we can do this work. We've already seen the historic momentum across this country to protect women's rights and access to health care. #SaveRoe #CareForAll

The country is on our side. The vast majority of people in this country believe that women should make their own personal health care decisions, and they support the right to access abortion safely and legally, without interference from politicians. https://t.co/lQUc6uqCht

Finally, we’ll be fighting abortion restrictions at their source: the stigma that still surrounds abortion in this country. We’ll be enhancing our efforts to destigmatize abortion in the media, everyday conversation, and across popular culture. #SaveRoe #CareForAll

Next, we’ll look at how we can use state policies to create an ironclad network of states across the country where abortion will remain legal. And we’ll continue to fight tooth and nail to stop legislation that seeks to further restrict access. #SaveRoe #CareForAll

First, we’ll expand services in states where abortion is likely to remain legal and accessible, and invest in technology and other resources to help people living in hostile states still access abortion, no matter what. #SaveRoe #CareForAll
So, this is our three-part plan to protect and expand access to safe, legal abortion nationwide: https://t.co/TzmEZVVLsg #SaveRoe #CareForAll

**side note** Fun fact, not only had we already been working on the plan, but the day that Kennedy announced his retirement, we were holding a 19-state summit on protecting abortion access in a post-roe world. Fortuitous timing! #SaveRoe #CareForAll

Planned Parenthood is not going to let this become a country where people can no longer access abortion. It was clear we needed a plan. And guess what!? We have a plan — a plan we have been working on since before Trump and Pence took office. #SaveRoe #CareForAll
20 states across the country are poised to ban abortion if Roe v. Wade is overturned. That would leave more than 25 million women without access to abortion in their state. #SaveRoe #CareForAll
There are right now 13 abortion cases only one step away from the Supreme Court. It's likely the court will rule on this issue in the next year or two #SaveRoe #CareForAll
With Brett Kavanaugh on the Supreme Court, we will likely see the further erosion — and perhaps complete reversal — of Roe v. Wade in the very near future.

Some news: Today, Planned Parenthood announced our multi-million dollar plan to protect and expand access to abortion, no matter what happens with the Supreme Court. https://t.co/cicVuS60LN #SaveRoe #CareForAll
